things.Desc: I enjoy snowmobiling. We have snowmobiles at our cabin in Star Valley, WY and we often travel there for vacation and to snowmobile.
I like to travel when i can. Some places i have been are Norway, Denmark, London, California. Traveling is always fun especially when you go with the right people. I usually go with family.
I like to play video games in my free time. It is a major stress reliever for me. I play on Xbox One.
I enjoy reading. I ususally read non-fiction books that include books about finance, self-help or informational.
I enjoy programming and learning programming techniques. Web programming is very fun and is satisfying when you finish a project.
I love seeing new movies and watching some tv shows. some of my favorite movies are Lord of the Rings, Rush Hour, & Harry Potter.
